title: Decoding the Check Engine Light: Top 5 Causes
summary: Don't panic! We decode the top five most common reasons your check engine light is on, from a loose gas cap to a faulty oxygen sensor.
content: Content for Decoding the Check Engine Light: Top 5 Causes goes here. This helpful article demystifies the most common warning light on any dashboard. It breaks down the top five issues that typically trigger the check engine light, explaining each one in simple, easy-to-understand language. The list includes common culprits like a loose or faulty gas cap, a failing oxygen sensor, mass airflow sensor issues, worn-out spark plugs or ignition coils, and problems with the catalytic converter. For each cause, the article describes the symptoms, the level of urgency, and the likely repair solutions, empowering car owners to have a more informed conversation with their mechanic and avoid unnecessary stress.
